about.label: Tell us more about yourself
about.help: For example, what is your favourite colour

time.label: What time can you attend your meeting?
time.help: Please tell us when you wish to attend your meeting

password.label: Please enter your password
password.help: Your password should contain at least one uppercase letter (A-Z), one lowercase letter (a-z) and one number (0-9)

employmentStatus.label: What is your current employment status

earnings.label: What is your monthly income
earnings.help: Include all earnings from any source

date.label: When did you last have a day off

fun.label: Was it fun filling in this form
